testEntries.test: SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-001] should validate valid SA ID numbers from 1970s to 2000s
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-002] should validate SA ID numbers with edge cases (leap years, century boundaries)
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-003] should reject SA ID numbers with invalid checksum
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-004] should reject SA ID numbers with invalid dates
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-005] should reject SA ID numbers with format/length issues
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-006] should validate age-based rules
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-007] should validate citizenship correctly
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-008] should validate business registrations for all entity types
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-009] should validate business registrations with branch numbers
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-010] should reject business registrations with format issues
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-011] should warn about invalid components in business registrations
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-012] should handle edge cases gracefully
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [PRODUCTION GRADE] [TC-013] should handle high volume validation with consistent performance
